body_html:
CI has miraculously passed, but it still makes me nervous because you just know someone's going to pipe up and be like "yo push_macro doesn't work on my compiler."

Could we... maybe do a feature test for it, in cmake?
body_text:
CI has miraculously passed, but it still makes me nervous because you just know someone's going to pipe up and be like "yo push_macro doesn't work on my compiler."
Could we... maybe do a feature test for it, in cmake?
body:
CI has miraculously passed, but it still makes me nervous because you just *know* someone's going to pipe up and be like "yo `push_macro` doesn't work on my compiler."

Could we... maybe do a feature test for it, in cmake?
